Event Handlers¶

Entity¶

class scripts.event_handlers.entity_handler.EntityHandler(event_hub)[source]¶

Bases: scripts.core.event_hub.Subscriber

Handle events affecting entities

process_event(event)[source]¶

Control entity events

Parameters

event (Event) – the event in need of processing

static process_move(event)[source]¶

Check if entity can move to the target tile, then either cancel the move (if blocked), bump attack (if target tile has entity) or move.

Parameters

event (MoveEvent) –

static process_skill(event)[source]¶

Process the entity`s skill :type event: UseSkillEvent :param event: the event to process :type event: EntityEvent

static process_die(event)[source]¶

Control the entity death :type event: DieEvent :param event: the event to process :type event: EntityEvent
